statements: SELECT * FROM property_tax_information WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT property_address, assessment_value FROM property_tax_information WHERE assessment_value > 50000;

SELECT property_address, assessment_value, payment_status FROM property_tax_information WHERE tax_due > 1000 ORDER BY assessment_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_tax_information WHERE tax_due <= 500 OR payment_status = true;
SELECT property_id, property_address FROM property_tax_information WHERE assessment_value BETWEEN 50000 AND 75000 ORDER BY property_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(assessment_value) AS avg_value, MAX(tax_due) AS max_tax FROM property_tax_information;
